allow: Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 >nul && set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && C:\Users\default.LAPTOP-BOBEDDVK\.local\bin\uvx.exe --from git+https://github.com/github/spec-kit.git specify init s77")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 >nul && set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 && set PYTHONLEGACYWINDOWSSTDIO=1 && C:\Users\default.LAPTOP-BOBEDDVK\.local\bin\uvx.exe --from git+https://github.com/github/spec-kit.git specify init s77 --force")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist s77 (echo s77 folder exists && dir s77) else (echo s77 folder does not exist)")
Bash(cmd /c "set NO_COLOR=1 && set TERM=dumb && C:\Users\default.LAPTOP-BOBEDDVK\.local\bin\uvx.exe --from git+https://github.com/github/spec-kit.git specify init s77 --here --force 2>&1")

Bash(cmd /c "set FORCE_COLOR=0 && set NO_COLOR=1 && set TERM=dumb && set PYTHONIOENCODING=ascii && C:\Users\default.LAPTOP-BOBEDDVK\.local\bin\uvx.exe --from git+https://github.com/github/spec-kit.git specify init s77 --here --force")
Bash(cmd /c "set PYTHONUTF8=1 && chcp 65001 && C:\Users\default.LAPTOP-BOBEDDVK\.local\bin\uvx.exe --from git+https://github.com/github/spec-kit.git specify init s77 --here --force 2>&1")
